page.title: 11The Grove
page.content: {Mrs Bromely-Derry}is matron at the {Grove}old peoples home.She has worked there for two and a half years.The Grove has actually been an old peoples home since{1952.}Mrs Bromely-Derry enjoys working at the home,the job involves managing the home and staff. She has five weeks holiday a year but tries only to take two weeks holiday in the summer because of the other staffs holidays.{32}people{work}at the Grove and{32}people{stay}at the Grove. A lot of people think that when they go into the Grove they are locked in, like a prison but they are not. To stay at the Grove it costs{Â£110}a week if you can afford it, but if you only have a pension it costs about{Â£27}a week. The oldest person is a lady of {94 years}of age and the youngest person is a man of{66 years}of age. Sadly when you go to the Grove you
